input_text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using product features and product title below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Product title:
National Imports Dorastore Italian Style 26 Ounce Glass Measuring Jar

Product features:
4" diameter x 9-1/2" H
Clear glass construction
Includes cups and ounces measurements
Easy pour spout
Perfect for measuring liquids and solids
Makes a beautiful display jar
Great for storing things like rice, candy, and other treats
Comes in gift packaging
Dishwasher safe

Product description:
input_text.Response A: Bring home the action of the WWE with a WWE Basic Braun Strowman Figure! Recreate your favorite matches with an approximately 6-inch figure in "Superstar scale." Pose him to spar in a menacing stance, pair him with another figure to battle or create total mayhem by adding multiple figures (each sold separately, subject to availability). Features articulation, amazing accuracy and authentic Superstar details like armbands and tatoos. Let the WWE mayhem begin! Colors and decorations may vary.
input_text.Response B: Make your cooking life easier by effortlessly measuring and pouring solids and liquids from the same jug with this Italian measuring jug. Constructed of clear glass, it includes measurements for both cups and ounces. The easy-pour spout makes it perfect for filling your coffee maker and storing rice, candy, and other treats. It makes a beautiful countertop display when not in use, and comes in gift packaging, making a great gift. Best of all, it is dishwasher-safe for effortless cleaning. 4" diameter x 9-1/2" H, with a 26-ounce capacity
